Core:PCProperties.Core:Property:
X[M] /*
----------------------------------- LIBRARY CONTENT (Merry/SAM)
Object: Lib:NIP:pkg:delivery Maintainer: Kalle Alm Email: kalle@mortalis.skotos.net Rev: 1.24 Generated: Sun Jan 8 00:06:25 2006 Last rev.: Sat Nov 27 01:23:41 2004 by zwoc (X)
(Do not modify #list#. Automatically constructed property.)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- lib:scrolls (M) Delivery system - display "scrolls" (pending deliveries) as woename. lib:scrolls-date (M) Delivery system - display "scrolls" (pending deliveries) sorted by recipient and by date. lib:scrolls-from (M) Delivery system - display "scrolls" (pending deliveries) sorted by sender. lib:scrolls-to (M) Delivery system - display "scrolls" (pending deliveries) sorted by recipient. ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
*/

X[M] /*
D=Delivery system - display "scrolls" (pending deliveries) as woename.
*/
Call(\$\{Lib:NIP:EXT:courier-functions\}, "scrolls", \$evoke: "ncs");

X[M] /*
D=Delivery system - display "scrolls" (pending deliveries) sorted by recipient and by date.
*/
Call(\$\{Lib:NIP:EXT:courier-functions\}, "scrolls-date", \$evoke: (\$argc ? implode(\$argv, " ") : ""));

X[M] /*
D=Delivery system - display "scrolls" (pending deliveries) sorted by sender.
*/
Call(\$\{Lib:NIP:EXT:courier-functions\}, "scrolls-from", \$evoke: (\$argc ? implode(\$argv, " ") : ""));

X[M] /*
D=Delivery system - display "scrolls" (pending deliveries) sorted by recipient.
*/
Call(\$\{Lib:NIP:EXT:courier-functions\}, "scrolls-to", \$evoke: (\$argc ? implode(\$argv, " ") : ""));
"Display pending deliveries, sorted by recipient, in three categories: Immediate, Hour-Day, Day-Week."
